channel.title: How can i run a rsps on mac ( creating a runescape private server)
channel.description: I really want to run a runescape private server but all the server clients are .jar and i cant make my own :( anyone got mac client and sources or can help me out? :(

item.title: How can i run a rsps on mac ( creating a runescape private server)
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

I have a mac book air 2014 model, I use eclipse and drag the source/ client into it as using cmd/ terminal on mac is a pain with the privacy settings, also as above changing things like cache path from C:/ drive on windows a mac would be “mac name/User/path” also using the right java version some lower revisions you need jdk6 or 7. a tip with mac is that you can unzip a .jar and find the .class file called launch/client or loader double click on it and it should run the client

Read full topic
item.source: How can i run a rsps on mac ( creating a runescape private server)

item.title: How can i run a rsps on mac ( creating a runescape private server)
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You need to change the file paths the server/client are using, then it should work on Mac too.

Read full topic
